Throws: if @B_android#service#autofill#BatchUpdates#Builder#build_E@ was already called before or no call to @B_android#service#autofill#BatchUpdates#Builder#updateTemplate_E@ or @B_android#service#autofill#BatchUpdates#Builder#transformChild_E@ has been made.

Parameters: RemoteViews: a @B_android#widget#RemoteViews_E@ with the updated actions to be applied in the underlying presentation template. This value must never be null.
Throws: if condition is not a class provided by the Android System.
updateTemplate(android.widget.RemoteView.Description: Applies the updates in the underlying presentation template. @B_android#service#autofill#BatchUpdates#Builder#transformChild_E@ are applied to the children views. Theme does not work with RemoteViews layout. Avoid hardcoded text color or background color: Autofill on different platforms may have different themes.

Parameters: int: view id of the children view.
Transformation: an implementation provided by the Android System. This value must never be null.
Throws: if transformation is not a class provided by the Android System.
transformChild(int,android.service.autof.Description: Adds a transformation to replace the value of a child view with the fields in the screen. When multiple transformations are added for the same child view, they are applied in the same order as added. @B_android#service#autofill#BatchUpdates#Builder#updateTemplate_E@ are applied to the presentation template.
